com.github.moribund.audio

Class MusicContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.audio.MusicContainer

  • public class MusicContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    The MusicContainer class contains MusicFiles. The music is populated lazily.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static MusicContainer instance
      The singleton instance of this container.
      private it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectOpenHashMap<MusicFile,com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music> musicForFile
      A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the Music in relation to their MusicFile.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private MusicContainer()
      The constructor for the MusicContainer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MusicContainer getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance or initializes it lazily if it is null.
      com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music getMusic(MusicFile musicFile)
      Gets a music for the file given.
      void setup()
      Sets up the musicForFile looping through every MusicFile value and using its MusicFile.location field and LibGDX's Audio class to make a new Music instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • musicForFile

        private final it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.objects.Object2ObjectOpenHashMap<MusicFile,com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music> musicForFile
        A Object2ObjectOpenHashMap that contains all the Music in relation to their MusicFile. The reason to prefer a Object2ObjectOpenHashMap over a HashMap is due to fastutil's superior efficiency compared to vanilla Java's.

      • instance

        private static MusicContainer instance
        The singleton instance of this container.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicContainer

        private MusicContainer()
        The constructor for the MusicContainer. This initializes musicForFile, then populates it by calling setup().

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up the musicForFile looping through every MusicFile value and using its MusicFile.location field and LibGDX's Audio class to make a new Music instance.

      • getMusic

        public com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music getMusic(MusicFile musicFile)
        Gets a music for the file given.
        Parameters:
        musicFile - The music track to play.
        Returns:
        The music for the track.

      • getInstance

        public static MusicContainer getInstance()
        Gets the singleton instance or initializes it lazily if it is null.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of the container.
